summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from August 6, 2019, discussing logistical planning for a search warrant execution on Jeffrey Epstein's private island off St. Thomas. The email indicates the Southern District of New York (SDNY) is drafting the affidavit, with plans to fly FBI personnel to the island on August 11, 2019, and conduct a search lasting 1-3 days.

persons.name: SSA Squad C-20
persons.context: Author of the initial email planning the logistics for the search warrant execution on Epstein's island. The signature indicates they lead the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in FBI New York.

events.title: Expected Warrant Swearing
events.description: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) is expected to have the search warrant for Epstein's island sworn out in St. Thomas.

events.title: Planned FBI Departure for Search
events.description: Tentative plan for FBI personnel to fly out on the FBI Q400 plane to St. Thomas to execute the search warrant on Epstein's island.

events.title: Planned Search of Epstein's Island
events.description: The search of Epstein's private island off St. Thomas, managed by the FBI's Evidence Response Team (ERT), is expected to take 1-3 days.

events.title: Planned FBI Return Travel
events.description: Tentative travel day for FBI personnel to return home following the search operation.

locations: New York (FBI New York field office implied)
keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) was drafting a search warrant affidavit for Jeffrey Epstein's private island in August 2019.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) in New York was planning and managing the logistics for the search operation.
The search was planned to be executed by the FBI's Evidence Response Team (ERT) and was expected to last 1-3 days.
The planning email was sent on August 6, 2019, indicating active investigation into Epstein's activities following his arrest in July 2019.
The document shows coordination between SDNY prosecutors and the FBI's New York field office for a significant evidence-gathering operation at a key Epstein property.
